resources.string:
You need to guess 4 numbers in 8 times!

1A - Means your guess includes one correct number in the correct position.

1B - Means your guess includes one correct number, not in the correct position.

1A2B - Means your guess includes one correct number in the correct position and two correct numbers, not in the correct position.

*Not allow same number!

You need to guess 4 numbers in 10 times!

1A - Means your guess includes one correct number in the correct position.

1B - Means your guess includes one correct number, not in the correct position.

1A2B - Means your guess includes one correct number in the correct position and two correct numbers, not in the correct position.

*Not allow same number!

You need to guess 5 numbers in 12 times!

1A - Means your guess includes one correct number in the correct position.

1B - Means your guess includes one correct number, not in the correct position.

1A2B - Means your guess includes one correct number in the correct position and two correct numbers, not in the correct position.

*Not allow same number!

You need to guess 4 colors in 8 times!

1 Green - Means your guess includes one correct colors in the correct position.

1 Red - Means your guess includes one correct colors, not in the correct position.

1 Green 2 Red - Means your guess includes one correct color in the correct position and two correct colors, not in the correct position.

*Not allow same colors!
